title: Bedrock Config
description: Config for building a design system management site based on Bedrock

dist.title: Dist directory
dist.description: The absolute path to where files will be written.

public.title: Public directory
public.description: The absolute path to where files will be available to the dev server.

site.title: Site
site.description: Settings related to site meta data, such as title and brand logos

parentBrand.title: Parent Brand
parentBrand.description: Settings related to the parent brand that owns/uses the design system

logo.title: Logo
logo.description: URI of image file for brand logo

homepage.title: Homepage
homepage.description: URI of homepage of parent brand

config.title: Configuration
config.description: Configurations, such as the api urls and debug.

apiUrlBase.title: Api Url Base
apiUrlBase.description: Url base for the api that supplies DS data

cruxCssUrl.title: Css Url
cruxCssUrl.description: Url for the DS css assets

cruxJsUrl.title: Js Url
cruxJsUrl.description: Url for the DS js assets

assetUrlBase.title: Assets (images, etc) url base
assetUrlBase.description: Url base fo the location of assets such as images

websocketsPort.title: Websockets Port
websocketsPort.description: Port number on which the component renderer is listening

DragTypes.title: Drag Types
DragTypes.description: Drag types globals for managing drag and drop

SLICE.title: Slice
SLICE.description: The slice type for drag and drop
